page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA..2
page.content: Sometimes we have Games or listen to poems and stories. Each day we have a play-time at 10.30 a.m. and at 2.30 p.m. We have another break at mid-day for a meal, either a packed lunch or a lunch made in the school canteen. When we have finished l play in the school field or play-ground or on the patio. On Mondays I have a recorder lesson which I enjoy. Sometimes I play the bass xylophone. The bus collects us at 3.45 p.m. each day. When I get home I tell my Mum about my day at school. We have tea and I watch television, or play with my friends or go to dancing lessons. At 8.00 p.m. I have a bath and get ready for bed at 9.00 p.m. Before I go to sleep I have a good read.
